price: 5. En Wij wensten een gunst te geven aan degenen die zwak in het land waren, en hen tot heersers en hen tot erfgenamen te maken.
arabic: وَنُرِيدُ أَن نَّمُنَّ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ وَنَجۡعَلَهُمُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wanurīdu an namunna ʿalā alladhīna us'tuḍ'ʿifū fī al-arḍi wanajʿalahum a-immatan wanajʿalahumu al-wārithīna
